title: What is the difference between Kendriya Vidyalaya and Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since I served Kendriya Vidyalaya as a PGT mathematics and now I am working in the Navodaya Vidyalaya so I am able to give answer of this question in property proper way Navodaya Vidyalaya and Kendriya Vidyalaya both institutions working under the ministry of human resource and development ( MHRD ) India.Both are fully funded by central government.Teachers have been appointed in both organisation by through ALL india examination and followed by interviews.Student in both organisation have been taken by definite process .In Navodaya examination is conducted for class 6th and 9th .so we can say both are sister organisations But major difference between them is such asKendriya Vidyalaya is day school while Navodaya Vidyalaya is a co-educational residential system .Kendriya Vidyalaya started by government of India by the Recommendation of second pay for employees who are working in central government or Transferable in all over India job.Navodaya Vidyalaya started by government under National new education policy 1986 for gifted children preferably rural. I hope it may be useful for you thanks

Being a navodaya student i am the right person to give your answer Kendriya Vidyalaya and Jawahar Navodaya schools are central government schools, affiliated to CBSE. The course curriculum of both the schools are according to CBSE guidelines. There is not much difference between both schools because both are central government schools. JNVs are fully residential schools unlike KVs. But jnv provide better service to rural talents.
